scripts.build:resource: cd packages/resource && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:slate-value: cd packages/slate-value && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:resource-service: cd packages/resource-service && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:slate-react-resource: cd packages/slate-react-resource && npm install && npm run build
scripts.buildall: npm run build:resource && npm run build:slate-value && npm run build:resource-service && npm run build:slate-react-resource
